chunks.zh: 坐标上海，预算 25-30，新手买车求指导
chunks.en: Located in Shanghai, budget 250-300k, seeking guidance for a novice buying a car.

chunks.zh:
本人（ 97 年）在上海上班，预计明后年结婚，今年想买辆车，请求各位老司机指导。

用车地点就是上海，日常通勤大概 10KM ，周末或者小假期可能会去周边逛逛，或者回趟老家，单程 400Km 左右。

计划是买辆偏家用型的车，油车电车倒是无所谓，个人倾向 SUV ，感觉 SUV 更适合家用，但意志并不坚定，不知道是否 SUV 更适合。

之前有看过小米 su7 、特斯拉 modelY ，但正儿八经只开过两款丰田的车，卡罗拉和荣放，都是我爸的。所以对其他车一无所知，也不太懂，请各位大哥推荐推荐。
chunks.en:
I (born in '97) work in Shanghai, planning to get married in the next year or two, and want to buy a car this year. Seeking guidance from experienced drivers.

Will be using the car in Shanghai, with a daily commute of about 10KM. On weekends or short holidays, I might visit the surrounding areas or return to my hometown, which is about 400km one way.

I plan to buy a car for family use. I'm open to both gasoline and electric cars, but I lean towards SUVs, as I feel they are more suitable for family use. However, I'm not entirely sure if an SUV is the best choice.

I've previously looked at the Xiaomi SU7 and Tesla Model Y, but I've only ever driven two Toyota cars, a Corolla and a RAV4, both of which belong to my father. So, I know nothing about other cars and don't understand much. Please recommend some choices.

chunks.zh: 你这情况，遇事不决，modelY
chunks.en: In your situation, when in doubt, go for the Model Y.

chunks.zh: @breeze5942 我的，看见这哥们儿发帖在推荐乐道，有点想撤回我的疑问。
chunks.en: @breeze5942 Saw this guy recommending Leda in a post, and I'm a bit inclined to withdraw my question.

chunks.zh: @vencent00 你别回我吧，你提乐道我压根就不想跟你聊了。
chunks.en: @vencent00 Please don't reply to me. I don't want to talk to you at all if you mention Leda.

chunks.zh: @breeze5942 没啥战斗力啊@FabricPath 放个暴论吧，24 年 25 年推 ModelY 的小屁孩懂个屁的车，方向盘都不知道摸过几个。
chunks.en: @breeze5942 Not much fighting power. @FabricPath Let me throw out a controversial opinion: those kids who recommend Model Y in 2024 and 2025 don't know anything about cars. They probably haven't touched a steering wheel many times.

chunks.zh: 特斯拉唯一做的好的就是成本控制，但是现在也卷不过国产了，焕新 Y 换个吉利标 15w 都卖不出去，特斯拉国内的销量也蹦跶不了几年了。
chunks.en: The only thing Tesla does well is cost control, but they can't compete with domestic brands now. Even if the refreshed Model Y had a Geely badge, it wouldn't sell for 150k. Tesla's domestic sales won't last for many years.

chunks.zh: 蔚来 ES6
chunks.en: Nio ES6

chunks.zh: 智界 R7
chunks.en: Luxeed R7

chunks.zh: 犹豫就选 model y 焕新版；如果后排长期不坐人，建议 model 3 ；轿车的操控性能比 suv 好多了，高速随便窜。
chunks.en: If you're hesitant, choose the refreshed Model Y; if the back seat won't be used regularly, consider the Model 3; the handling performance of sedans is much better than SUVs, and they can easily accelerate on the highway.

chunks.zh: 抛开车来看，特斯拉售后套路极少，保内损坏直接换。
chunks.en: Putting the car aside, Tesla's after-sales service has very few tricks, and they directly replace damaged parts under warranty.

chunks.zh: 比如我主观觉得方向盘按钮不灵敏，换了按键模块；我听到玻璃升降器有细微卡齿的声音（可能是我自己把车窗玻璃撞墙上撞坏的），换了升降器我觉得开起来车门有口哨声，换了胶条。
chunks.en: For example, I subjectively felt that the steering wheel buttons were not sensitive, so they replaced the button module; I heard a slight clicking sound from the window lifter (maybe I broke the window glass by hitting it against the wall), so they replaced the lifter. I felt the door whistled when driving, so they replaced the rubber strip.

chunks.zh: 2 年保养总花费 四轮换位 100 多（滤芯用的续保 188 套餐的券）
chunks.en: The total cost of maintenance for 2 years was just over 100 for tire rotation (the filter was used with a 188 yuan package coupon for continued insurance).

chunks.zh: 自己试驾，多试几圈，别人推荐不一定适合你犹豫不决就 ModelY ，可能不是最好的选择，但一定是不错的选择，销量第一的车型不会有啥问题。
chunks.en: Test drive yourself, take it for several spins. Other people's recommendations may not suit you. If you are hesitant, just go for Model Y. It may not be the best choice, but it is definitely a good choice. The best-selling model shouldn't have any problems.

chunks.zh: 好像清一色就是 model Y 和 ES6 了。
chunks.en: It seems that the only choices are Model Y and ES6.

chunks.zh: 我感觉都去试驾一下看看感觉好了。
chunks.en: I feel that a feel for each can be best developed through a test drive.

chunks.zh: 这两款车我都试驾过，我感觉各有特色吧。
chunks.en: I've test-driven both of these cars and I feel they each have their own unique characteristics.

chunks.zh: 最好带上对象一起去试驾看看。
chunks.en: It's best to bring your partner along for the test drive.

chunks.zh: 小米 su7 、特斯拉 modelY 都可以 PASS 了，个人推荐问界 M7 ，深蓝 S07,等。
chunks.en: Xiaomi SU7 and Tesla Model Y can both be passed over. I personally recommend the AITO M7, Deepal S07, etc.

chunks.zh: 这两个智驾都不错，你开长途会省心不少。
chunks.en: These two have good intelligent driving capabilities, which will make your long-distance driving much easier.

chunks.zh: 家用空间也够用，如果对增程没有意见，理想也可以考虑。
chunks.en: The family space is also sufficient. If you have no objection to extended range, you can also consider Li Auto.

chunks.zh: 强烈建议要试驾，有些电车开起来跟油车差距很大，你可能会不习惯。
chunks.en: I strongly suggest taking a test drive. Some electric cars drive very differently from gasoline cars, and you may not get used to it.

chunks.zh: @vencent00 销量
chunks.en: @vencent00 Sales

chunks.zh: 闭眼买华为,睁眼买特斯拉
chunks.en: Buy Huawei with your eyes closed, buy Tesla with your eyes open.

chunks.zh: 推荐比亚迪。来大家一起背刺吧。。。
chunks.en: Recommend BYD. Let's all backstab each other...

chunks.zh: @vencent00 幽默懂哥 ”乐道“ “小屁孩” “懂个屁” ”蹦跶不了几年“
chunks.en: @vencent00 Humorous know-it-all "Leda" "kid" "knows nothing" "won't last for many years"

chunks.zh: 你 97 的(28 岁) 买 30 万车，我也 97 的(28 岁) 骑共享单车，还是天天找代金券
chunks.en: You, born in '97 (28 years old), are buying a 300k car, while I, born in '97 (28 years old), ride a shared bike and still look for coupons every day.

chunks.zh: @Richardwang2308 #108 /t/1111925
chunks.en: @Richardwang2308 #108 /t/1111925

chunks.zh: @vencent00 有一说一，小米确实算国产里安全性优秀的，其他呢？
chunks.en: @vencent00 Honestly speaking, Xiaomi is indeed one of the best domestic brands in terms of safety, but what about others?

chunks.zh: 中保研测了某车之后直接被 ota 了，导致现在很多新车都没有数据。
chunks.en: After C-IASI tested a certain car, it was directly OTA'd, resulting in many new cars having no data.

chunks.zh: 抛开充值帝不看，你是相信一款全球车型，国内外安全测试都优秀的，还是相信没有数据的？
chunks.en: Ignoring the fanboys, do you believe in a global model with excellent safety tests at home and abroad, or do you believe in something with no data?

chunks.zh: 等国产新能源出事故后不抠车标，不盖布，再来谈信任问题。
chunks.en: Let's talk about trust when domestic new energy vehicles have accidents and don't remove the car logos or cover them with cloths.

chunks.zh: 就车身结构，轻的车肯定撞不过重的，但是对车内人员的保护就另说了。
chunks.en: In terms of body structure, a light car will definitely not crash as well as a heavy one, but the protection of the occupants is another matter.

chunks.zh: 别考虑那么多，直接 Model Y 吧。
chunks.en: Don't think too much, just get the Model Y.

chunks.zh: >>> 油车电车倒是无所谓有蓝牌？不是要拍吗？
chunks.en: >>> Gasoline or electric car doesn't matter, do you have a license plate? Don't you need to bid for it?

chunks.zh: 有牌子了?
chunks.en: Do you have a license plate?
